skills.skill: Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Health Disorders

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide meaningful and high-impact youth crisis intervention, mental health evaluation and diagnosis, treatment planning, therapy, case management, and group work with a significant focus on school-based services and support to families.

Incorporate culturally-responsive mental health care and work directly with Tribal youth communities to diagnose and treat youth experiencing mental health disorders through a multidisciplinary and culturally appropriate treatment plan approach.
Spend quality one-on-one time with students to build stronger and more meaningful connections due to lower student populations in local schools.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in a behavioral health related field (recent graduates welcome!)
